Created attachment 578866
Error do incr every time firefox causes the spike

First of all i am using firefox beta channel (current 9.0)

Description of problem:
Before i start firefox, i put some music or a movie on playback. Just using a program to play some sound on my firewire fireface400 audio device. The music or movie playback is perfect until i launch firefox with hardware acceleration on. Discovered that the problem disappeared with gfx.direct2d.disabled true.

I don't know what the problem is, so i need some help debugging it so i can provide a good bug report if it is a bug.

I expect my music\movie playback not to be affected by firefox. When i start firefox the music start to spike and my fireface400 sound-card is reporting Errors:1..5+++; Watch picture fireface400.png So in that cause it seems like firefox is causing a starvation of the sound-card buffer. But i will not guess more on what it can be.

To cause the spikes, i just have to watch a animated image like the bugzilla dragon when you search for a bug, or i can scroll a webpage up and down.
It also happens when i hover over the firefox gui buttons like tabs, bookmarks toolbar, etc.
